insect.coverage.execution
Class CallMonitor

java.lang.Object
  insect.coverage.execution.CallMonitor
public class CallMonitor
extends java.lang.Object

Provides methods for instrumented programs to report the invocation of methods during runtime.

Author:
Anil Chawla

Field Summary
static boolean initialized
           
 
Constructor Summary
CallMonitor()
           
 
Method Summary
static void init()
          Initializes this monitoring class if not already initialized.
static void quit()
          Outputs the set of all method calls to a file named "insect.calls".
static void reportMono(java.lang.String className, int lineNum, int callingID, int calledID)
          Method to report the invocation of a method whose runtime object type is statically known.
static void reportPoly(java.lang.Object o, int lineNum, int callingID, int calledID)
          Method to report the invocation of a method whose runtime object type is determined dynamically.

initialized

public static boolean initialized
Constructor Detail

CallMonitor

public CallMonitor()
Method Detail

init

public static void init()
Initializes this monitoring class if not already initialized.

reportMono

public static void reportMono(java.lang.String className,
                              int lineNum,
                              int callingID,
                              int calledID)
Method to report the invocation of a method whose runtime object type is statically known.

Parameters:
className - class of object on which method was invoked
lineNum - source line number of method call
callingID - id of invoking method
calledID - id of invoked method

reportPoly

public static void reportPoly(java.lang.Object o,
                              int lineNum,
                              int callingID,
                              int calledID)
Method to report the invocation of a method whose runtime object type is determined dynamically.

Parameters:
o - object on which method was invoked
lineNum - source line number of method call
callingID - id of invoking method
calledID - id of invoked method

quit

public static void quit()
Outputs the set of all method calls to a file named "insect.calls". If profiling is enabled, a file named "insect.pcalls" is also output. Invoked on VM shutdown.
